meanings.definition: A squid or cuttlefish used as food.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new recipe with calamar for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious calamar dishes.
meanings.sent3: When the calamar started dancing on the plate, everyone was amazed!
meanings.sent4: The calamar's tentacles reached out like a mysterious underwater creature.
meanings.sent5: The fresh calamar glistened in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A dish made with squid or cuttlefish.
meanings.sent1: My favorite calamar dish is the spicy calamari salad.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a special calamar dish for the event.
meanings.sent3: The calamar dish was so good, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the calamar dish danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the calamar dish filled the room, making everyone hungry.
